Genomics_ConceptTask.TEXT: Collected clinical data and biological samples for the study: JC-P, MS-V, CH-C, EH-M, MC-C, NR-Z, CM-M, AC-L, AD, LM-H, DD-Z, DR-G, TR-R, DC-R and CM-M. Performed in vitro infections: GR-M, LJ-Á, CC-G, EM-G, and AC-L. Performed CXCL17 ELISA assays: JC-P, LJ-Á, GR-M, and LF-L. Obtained and analyzed autopsy lung specimens: CS-L, CS, FB-M, PG-O, and CL-R. Analyzed and discussed data: JC-P, E-CP, MS-V, EG-L, TR-R, SK, and JZ. Drafted the manuscript: JC-P, SK, AZ, and JZ. All authors contributed to the article and approved the submitted version.
